conversation.message: That is an excellent follow-up question, Seeker_A. We believe transparency in career pathing is crucial. A new hire typically starts as an Associate, and within 12-18 months, they are eligible for promotion to a Mid-Level Specialist based on performance reviews and skill acquisition. Progression to Senior status usually happens between 3-5 years. Our structured mentorship program pairs every new hire with a senior leader for the first six months, focusing on core competencies and personalized development goals. Furthermore, we run 'Leadership Readiness' workshops quarterly for those targeting management roles. For example, last year, two Associates were fast-tracked into Mid-Level roles in just 10 months after completing a specialized certification funded entirely by the company. Does this framework align with the pace of growth you are seeking?
